text:
Simplify Exponents Using Product and Quotient

\begin{array}{l}\n\text { How to simplify exponents } \\\n\begin{array}{ll}\n\text { (2) } x \cdot x \cdot x \cdot x \cdot x= & \\\n\text { (2) }(x \cdot x \cdot x)(x \cdot x)= & \\\n& \frac{x \cdot x}{x-x \cdot x \cdot x}\n\end{array}\n\end{array}[imath]\text { How to simplify exponents } [/imath] [imath]\begin{array}{ll}\n\text { (2) } x \cdot x \cdot x \cdot x \cdot x= & [/imath] [imath]\text { (2) }(x \cdot x \cdot x)(x \cdot x)= & [/imath] [imath]& \frac{x \cdot x}{x-x \cdot x \cdot x}[/imath]
